title.new: Feature request: identify connected components of undirected graph
title.old: Feature request: identify connected components of directed graph

issue.title: Feature request: identify connected components of undirected graph

message.raw:
I changed title back to focus on undirected graph, since I think the following could be done for the use case I mentioned:

* convert directed graph to undirected graph (with #80)
* partition undirected graph into subgraphs consisting of connected components (this issue)
* partition original directed graph into sub-graphs consisting of the same vertices as the undirected connected subgraphs, with directed edges copied from original graph
